channel.title: Willing to pay for a hoster
channel.description:
Well I can't run a server yet no guide can help me =[
My old hoster has irl things to do so If you'd like to work with me in making servers and running I'd like a good person that has a non laggy comp. I am a noob coder *new at it* but I'm working on skill cape an othe items in a few servs. Atm I got a pk 1 an a skiller one..
App to be my server hoster for free ( might pay 300k a week|possibly ) [QUOTE]1.Can you run a server? 2.How long could you keep it on? ( I wouldn't mind if it's above 5hrs. ) 3.Do you have msn? 4.Do you have a server restarter? 5.Have you ever hosted another persons server?who? [/QUOTE]
Well I got forums, a site its free but i might add paypal to forums and buy a website. My server hoster must have 25 - 50+ posts..
What I'v added to server and whats source?
Telescape Source - Pimpscape Source -Skill capes -Drag boots, torso, defender.. -A skill cape shop (fixin price)
Need to know info----
-I'm paying 200k for 1st week pay 2 days after running server. Tonight if you run it it's 1 day. -You can choose to be Co-Owner or a Owner, or w/e you choose.... -You must run server on a 30minute restart-1hour restart . -You will be gaining rs2 gp faster if you run server 24.7 -You will be payed each Friday after 1st pay, No acceptions (excuse my spelling) -I will be active on Msn, on my forums, and on Rune-server.. So I'm always easy to find. -We will be like friends and try our best to help each other out :) -Thats it, please do help me out :D
Ps: I'll send you the uploaded server on up uppIT each time I update. And I'll most likely scan it but if you allow me to just send it and you scan it I'd be very grateful :D
and also if you know I robin i I'm her brother... *sighs* I'm better at coding then her at least lol... :)
Anyway ASK QUESTIONS HERE....
As soon as we talk on msn I'll send you the serv on uppIT.
~John
( Also If a mod can change my name to J,o,h,n or j o h n, ect.. I'd appriciate it)
Also I have msn, my msn is [email]John_95-07@hotmail.com[/email] I'll alkways be on most likely.
A vid of the scan on jotti and yes it says Oversized .zip but I don't think it'll hurt...
[IMG]http://i241.photobucket.com/albums/ff80/ub3r_0wn4g3/untitled.jpg[/img]
PS: MODS STOP DELETING MY TOPICS IF YOU ARE...
This Is considered " Help " and i deals with rs2 servers because I need a person to run my server Since I am not able.

item.title: Willing to pay for a hoster
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

1.Can you run a server? Yeah
2.How long could you keep it on? Mmm, 24/7 depending if my internet connection doesn’t fuck up, because recently my connection have been having trouble ETC ETC…
3.Do you have msn? I do, keeyyrraann@hotmail.com
4.Do you have a server restarter? Yeah
5.Have you ever hosted another persons server? Called Enzo, but stopped for a bit because hes coding… And my own =P

Read full topic

@I_robin_I wrote:

Well I can’t run a server yet no guide can help me =[

My old hoster has irl things to do so If you’d like to work with me in making servers and running I’d like a good person that has a non laggy comp. I am a noob coder new at it but I’m working on skill cape an othe items in a few servs. Atm I got a pk 1 an a skiller one…

App to be my server hoster for free ( might pay 300k a week|possibly )

[QUOTE]1.Can you run a server?

3.Do you have msn?
4.Do you have a server restarter?

[/QUOTE]

Well I got forums, a site its free but i might add paypal to forums and buy a website.
My server hoster must have 25 - 50+ posts…

What I’v added to server and whats source?

Telescape Source - Pimpscape Source
-Skill capes
-Drag boots, torso, defender…

-You will be gaining rs2 gp faster if you run server 24.7

-We will be like friends and try our best to help each other out

Ps: I’ll send you the uploaded server on up uppIT each time I update. And I’ll most likely scan it but if you allow me to just send it and you scan it I’d be very grateful

and also if you know I robin i I’m her brother… sighs I’m better at coding then her at least lol…
